original_text: Now finish the work. When you started, you wanted very much to do it. Now you should want just as much to finish it. You should give what you are able to give.
korean_text: 이제는 하던 일을 성취할지니 마음에 원하던 것과 같이 완성하되 있는 대로 하라

sentences.original_text: When you started, you wanted very much to do it.
sentences.korean_translation: 시작할 때, 당신은 그것을 매우 하고 싶어했습니다.

sentences.original_text: Now you should want just as much to finish it.
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 당신은 그것을 마치는 것을 똑같이 원해야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: You should give what you are able to give.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 줄 수 있는 것을 주어야 합니다.
